title: WILD ~ TCM Herbal Blends
description: WILD Flavors GmbH unveiled three new herbal blends of detoxification, immunity and blood glucose management based on traditional Chinese medicine (TCM).
cleaned_text: Sponsored By WILD ~ TCM Herbal BlendsWILD ~ TCM Herbal Blends May 6, 2013 1 Min Read ERLANGER, Ky. [WILD Flavors GmbH](http://www.wildflavors.com/) unveiled three new herbal blends of detoxification, immunity and [blood glucose](https://www.naturalproductsinsider.com/topics/blood-glucose.aspx) management based on traditional Chinese medicine (TCM). WILD partnered with various experts in Beijing, [China](https://www.naturalproductsinsider.com/topics/china.aspx), along with Subhuti Dharmananda, Ph.D., of Institute for Traditional Medicine, to create these TCM-inspired blends using proprietary natural flavors and Resolver technology. These herbal blends can be used in a variety of applications including teas, carbonated drinks, juices, dry beverage mixes, tablets, gummies and more. Stay updated with the latest information on blends and flavors by visiting INSIDER's [New Ingredients](https://www.naturalproductsinsider.com/topics/new-ingredients.aspx) Topic Feed.
